QuestData.Title: Don't. Stop. Moving.
QuestData.Description: When Deathwing came, the Stone Dragons flocked to him. In his absence, they are again without purpose. They swarm and feed upon our kin.$B$BI have bound dozens of Opalescent Guardians, but am unable to lead them from the safety of cover. I need someone more swift, as I suspect you might be.$B$BLead them by ground towards Therazane's Throne to the east. Surely, some will not make it, but as long as you keep moving, you should be able to bring several to join our forces there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rush at least 5 Opalescent Guardians east by ground, out of the Pale Roost, to the stone circle near Therazane's Throne.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. Of my main strengths, speed is not one.
